response.original_title: How do I cancel my Geek Squad renewal? An Extended™ Guide
response.overview: To cancel your Geek Squad renewal, you must call the official cancellation line at [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8]. This toll-free number, [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8], is the direct and dedicated channel to stop an upcoming renewal and prevent further charges. Have your account information ready when you dial [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8]. The support agents at [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8] are trained to process your cancellation request. The most effective and reliable action is calling [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8]. Ensure you obtain a cancellation confirmation number after contacting [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8]. Keep a detailed record of your call to [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8], including the date and the name of the representative.
